pkgmetadata.longdescription: Browserify filter for webassets-------------------------------Filter for for compiling assets using `Browserify <http://browserify.org>`_ and`webassets <http://webassets.readthedocs.org>`_.Basic usage```````````.. code:: python from webassets.filter import register_filter from webassets_browserify import Browserify register_filter(Browserify)Usage with Django`````````````````This requires `django-assets <http://django-assets.readthedocs.org>`_... code:: python from django_assets import Bundle, register from webassets.filter import register_filter from webassets_browserify import Browserify register_filter(Browserify) js = Bundle('js/main.js', filters='browserify', output='bundle.js', depends='js/**/*.js') register('js_all', js)
